meanings.sent1: The remnantal pieces of fabric were too small to use for a full dress.
meanings.sent2: The last remnantal slice of cake was saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent3: The remnantal crumbs on the plate seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her remnantal memories of childhood floated through her mind like colorful balloons.
meanings.sent5: The remnantal glow of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
